item.description:
This first meeting will give us a chance to get to know each other. We will have a chance to discuss what we are hoping to get out of meeting together, and what structure and format would be most helpful to everyone.

Please bring 3 short lists to our first meetup: 1)favorite books I've read 2)book(s) I'm reading right now 3)books that I plan on reading in the future.
item.how_to_find_us: holding a sign, meeting at the coffee/snacks stand line to purchase
item.name: Introductory get together
